mapper.select: SELECT rc_detail_top || ' - ' || rc_detail_bottom FROM t_recommend_category WHERE rc_id = #{rc_id}

SELECT s.si_id AS siId, s.si_name AS siName, s.si_loca AS siLoca, s.si_minperson AS siMinperson, s.si_minprice AS siMinprice, ROUND((1 - s.si_discount) * s.si_minprice) AS discountedPrice, s.si_discount * 100 AS discount, s.si_maxperson AS siMaxperson, ( SELECT sp.sp_url FROM t_stay_photo sp WHERE sp.si_id = s.si_id AND sp.ri_id IS NULL AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS spUrl FROM t_stay_info s WHERE s.si_id IN ( SELECT sr.si_id FROM t_stay_recommend sr WHERE sr.rc_id = #{rc_id} )
